law.catch_line: Shipments across county and out of dry or moist territory not affected.
law.text: KRS 242.260 and 242.280 shall not apply to the transportation of alcoholic beverages through dry or moist territory to a point in some other state, or to a point in this state where alcoholic beverages may be lawfully sold; or to the receipt or acceptance by a common carrier from a manufacturer for transportation to a point in another state or to a point in this state where alcoholic beverages may lawfully be sold.
law.history: Amended 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 121, sec. 28, effective June 25, 2013. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2554c-22.
